meanings.definition: To hit someone on the head.
meanings.sent1: He konked his brother on the head with a toy.
meanings.sent2: She konked the doorframe accidentally while walking.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten konked the vase off the table.
meanings.sent4: The falling branch konked the hiker on the head.
meanings.sent5: The baseball player konked the ball out of the park.

meanings.definition: To fall asleep suddenly or heavily.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, he konked out on the couch.
meanings.sent2: She konked out as soon as her head hit the pillow.
meanings.sent3: The baby konked out in the middle of playing with toys.
meanings.sent4: The tired student konked out during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent5: The exhausted dog konked out after a day of playing in the park.
